en.41: Coast aims to design appealing and practical men’s swimwear. One of the ways we hope to do this is by changing the trend and bringing back the fitted swimsuit styles of the pre 80s. Men in North America have been swimming in boardshorts for the last 35 years and to us that style of swimwear is not appealing nor practical. Our products are designed and MADE IN CANADA.
